document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-08
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 12.04 TITLED "PARK AND RECREATION AREA USE REGULATIONS" BY REVISING SECTIONS 12.04.050, 12.04.080, 12.04.110, 12.04.170, 12.04.210, AND ADDING SECTIONS 12.04.220 AND 12.04.221 TO THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE ESTABLISHING TRAIL USE RE.GULATIONS
